TopicTitle: Hello terrestrian, can you ear meeeeee??

Articles.Content:
Hi there!! 

**I need** **more planets** **to spread the kerbalians!!!!** ;P

Welcome! Nice rocket.

New planets will be added eventually, but Squad will need to work out some game breaking bugs involving interplanetary travel.
Welcome to the forums ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif), I too entered the forum with a Mun landing to present.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
